item.title: By: HAY GUYS

item.description: I wish I had something worthwhile to add to this post or to any of the posts, but this was the best I could do.
item.content:encoded: I wish I had something worthwhile to add to this post or to any of the posts, but this was the best I could do.

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
My guess is the chests. Several camps only a short pony ride apart that spawn chests.
EDIT: this particular STV camper is almost always in STV and the few times I ran across him/her while I was questing there, he/she was working the chest circuit.
item.content:encoded:
My guess is the chests. Several camps only a short pony ride apart that spawn chests.

EDIT: this particular STV camper is almost always in STV and the few times I ran across him/her while I was questing there, he/she was working the chest circuit.

item.title: By: tranixx
item.dc:creator: tranixx
item.description:
Azshara I can understand, its got lots of 50+ mobs and nobody really goes there. Sure, the thunderhead farming got nerfed, but I can still imagine theres some good stuff there. Pretty much everyone 50+ who isnt in an instance uses plaguelands to grind because of the argent dawn faction benifits.
But STV, whats up with that? As far as I recall, the mobs there dont go beyond about level 40. Any idea what the attraction is?
item.content:encoded:
Azshara I can understand, its got lots of 50+ mobs and nobody really goes there. Sure, the thunderhead farming got nerfed, but I can still imagine theres some good stuff there. Pretty much everyone 50+ who isnt in an instance uses plaguelands to grind because of the argent dawn faction benifits.

But STV, whats up with that? As far as I recall, the mobs there dont go beyond about level 40. Any idea what the attraction is?
